report.title: EBMS Year Plot Count report - JAPAN TEST VERSION
report.description: EBMS specific, for use with the Year by Year plot form: gives year counts using summary_builder data, JSON format. This version of report also returns common names in supplied language.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM summary_occurrences so LEFT JOIN ( /* Use non-cache table for ordering, as common name specific sort orders are not copied to cache table. Japan has specific sort orders. */ SELECT cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id as taxon_meaning_id, string_agg(cttl_common.taxon, ',' ORDER BY cttl_common.id) as combined FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_common JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl_common on ttl_common.id = cttl_common.id WHERE cttl_common.language_iso = '#language_iso#' AND cttl_common.preferred = false AND cttl_common.taxon_list_id = (#taxon_list_id#) GROUP BY cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id) common ON common.taxon_meaning_id = so.taxon_meaning_id #joins# WHERE so.location_id = #location_id# AND so.user_id = 0 AND #website_filter#

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: language_iso
param.description: Three letter ISO code for language.
